pages.text: $(li)Creepers are common hostile creatures that can be found over the Overworld when the night arrives or in places with low illumination.$(br)$(li)They silently approaches you and finally, explotes, damaging you and near blocks.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gunpowder)Gunpowder$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/savage_and_ravage/creeper_spores)Creeper Spores$(/l) on death.
$(li)If a Creeper is strucked by a lightning, it will turns into $(l)Charged Creeper$().$(br)$(li)This creature inflicts more damage when explotes.
pages.title: Charged Creeper
